nodes.text: The City Bigspace was a popular concourse in the Gungan city of Otoh Gunga, located in the depths of Lake Paonga on Naboo.

The City Bigspace was commissioned by Boss Rugor Nass, eager to leave his mark on the development of the lake city. It became a popular attraction for visitors from all over Otoh Gunga and the surrounding Gungan settlements. A multi-level entertainment district, there were several boutiques, theaters, and performance venues. The walkways were dotted with local art, fountains, and gardens waiting to be explored by visitors. The notable Refreshment Bubble provided a wide variety of restaurants and refreshment vendors.
